title: Incorrect Password/Username ; Please help
body: Once I finished patching to 6.15, I launched the game and tried to log in with my original password, but it claimed that I had the incorrect ussername/password. I went onto the main website to change my password and went through the procedure again, but it still claimed it was incorrect. That's when I decided to see if I had to restart my computer. When it booted back up, I tried it again, and still nothing. I tried changing my password again and it still told me I had the wrong password. Then I looked into tracking my username and when I put in both my emails for it to send the verification, neither of them have received the email. I am starting to get annoyed. Please help.

replies.body: Incorrect login information can be caused by logging into the incorrect region, but can also suggest a change in your account.  As a first step, go over our [account recovery guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to troubleshoot and restore access to your account.  This should get you back in, but let me know!

Communicate with Riot’s [Account Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 

* Under the secondary select **Account.**

* For the tertiary category select **Management**
